name: ThreadCore
description:
ThreadCore is a Roguelike Core Defense Game. Enemies swarm your core and it is your task to keep them away. Once the Core or the player reaches zero HP the game is over. To prevent that from happening, attack the enemies yourself or summon spells to keep them at bay. 

Controls:

W,A,S,D : movement

Left Click : Melee Attack (in direction of your mouse relative to player)

Right Click : Ranged Attack (unlocked via "new ability" in the levelup screen)

Spacebar : after connecting lines, press space to trigger the pattern (different effects for different amounts of lines connected)

Escape : pause game


ThreadCore was made as a semesterproject for HTW Berlin. This is our first game in the second semester of studying.
